name: UploadFileToFileManager
description:
Upload a new file or image to the File Manager.

Use this tool to upload files or images to the File Manager, enhancing content management.

parameters.name: file_name
parameters.description: The name to be assigned to the uploaded file.

parameters.name: file_content_base64
parameters.description: The base64-encoded contents of the file to be uploaded.

value_schema.description: The base64-encoded contents of the file.

parameters.name: folder_id
parameters.description: The ID of the folder where the file will be uploaded. This should be an integer.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Mailchimp Marketing API.

parameters.name: file_data
parameters.description: The base64-encoded contents of the file.

value_schema.description: The base64-encoded contents of the file.

secrets.description: The OAuth token to use for authentication.
